entries.testimonial: He is an excellent shopper — a true gentleman who always goes above and beyond. I would welcome him into my home any time.
entries.name: Veronica Wright

entries.testimonial: He’s such a lovely young man. He helps with my groceries and even plays guitar for Peter, which brought back wonderful memories from his band days. We were joking that we should adopt him!
entries.name: Peter Rochfort

entries.testimonial: My scheduler is always cheerful, pleasant, and incredibly helpful — every single time. Any change to Harold’s visits is always communicated clearly by phone or text.
entries.name: Mrs Jarvis (for Harold Jarvis)

entries.testimonial: After I had a fall, my care support worker did everything she could to help — she was truly lovely. I was very grateful for her support.
entries.name: Rosa Mignanelli

entries.testimonial: I’m very satisfied with my care support worker today and would love to have him back again.
entries.name: Eugen Kozic

entries.testimonial: I’m settling in well and feeling much better. I’m grateful for all the support provided — thank you for helping me through this transition.
entries.name: Marian Robinson

entries.testimonial: I’m very happy with my care support worker and would love to have her support whenever possible. She’s been wonderful.
entries.name: Jennifer Ruth Ransom

entries.testimonial: Thank you so much for all the support. I’m very happy with the non-slip socks I received.
entries.name: Pamela June Mahoney

entries.testimonial: My care worker was wonderful and I’m very happy with Mosaic’s support. I’m grateful for everything you’ve provided.
entries.name: Sabina Morgan

entries.testimonial: Ron has developed a wonderful rapport with his carer — they even enjoy playing soccer together in the park on sunny days.
entries.name: Ronald Madge

entries.testimonial: Since the carers have come into his life, his mind has been much more stimulated and his conversations more lively.
Your centre supported us through a domestic violence situation and helped us organise everything we needed to survive.
entries.name: Nadezhda Aubin

entries.testimonial: Elena has supported my family for over a year — she’s a blessing. Thank you for having such a wonderful specialist.
I wanted to pass on how pleased I am with my care worker. She did a wonderful job and I’m grateful for her support.
entries.name: Roger Turner

entries.testimonial: Your receptionist is always so pleasant and helpful on the phone. She makes every interaction easy.
entries.name: Jocelyn Dowding

entries.testimonial: the caseworker’s empathy, patience, and dedication have made such a difference in my life. She listens without judgment and always advocates on my behalf.
entries.name: Nathan Truong

entries.testimonial: She has helped me feel respected and supported — truly a compassionate professional.
Mosaic has been incredible in supporting my settlement journey, especially through my case worker.
entries.name: Tara Tamanna

entries.testimonial: She helped us with housing, improving my resume, and finding employment — she genuinely cared and believed in us.
She guided me not only practically but emotionally.
the caseworker has been amazing to work with — intelligent, professional, and always understanding what’s needed. We felt so comfortable and supported throughout.
entries.name: Ali

entries.testimonial: I’m very happy with the caseworker’s help. She is respectful, caring, and adds great value to Mosaic.
entries.name: Terez Al Talli

entries.testimonial: Volunteering has given me a sense of purpose since 1983 — it’s incredibly rewarding to help people in their own language and connect deeply with others.
entries.name: Joop de Wit

entries.testimonial: Over the years, these connections have become like an extended family to me, widening my world through culture, friendship, and shared experiences.
I love helping migrant refugees build a new life in Australia — it’s meaningful and fulfilling.
entries.name: Dennis Archibald

entries.testimonial: As the child of migrants myself, I want newcomers to feel welcome and supported. Mosaic’s staff and volunteers have been wonderful to work with.
Meeting the students and learning about their journeys has been inspiring — their resilience and can-do attitude amaze me.
entries.name: Shani Herat Gunaratne

entries.testimonial: Watching them grow socially and academically is incredibly rewarding. As the child of immigrants, it’s meaningful to help them embrace life in Australia.
The Mosaic team is warm, supportive, and a joy to work with. I’ve met many grateful clients, and I hope my small contribution helps them build a new life here.
entries.name: Peter Cook

entries.testimonial: Having struggled myself to establish a career decades ago, I feel compelled to support those with an even tougher path.
I enjoy helping people through what can be a stressful and complex process, and I’ve met so many wonderful people.
entries.name: Lizzie Evered

entries.testimonial: I believe everyone has a responsibility to help where they can, and volunteering with Mosaic has been a truly meaningful experience.
I really enjoy the conversations I share during my visits — whether reminiscing about familiar places or chatting about current events, sport, or everyday life.
entries.name: Bill Livingstone

entries.testimonial: Seeing how much people enjoy and engage in these moments reminds me how meaningful this volunteer work is.
Volunteering at the Homework Centre allows me to use my teaching skills and support students as they gain confidence in language and maths.
entries.name: Gaylia Bigg

entries.testimonial: I’ve enjoyed working with the coordinator and volunteers, each bringing unique life experiences.
Helping new arrivals and learning from their cultures has been fulfilling and fun.
